EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Point of Contact (1351873064.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Joyce, My name is Sara Conde and I received your contact information from Jeanna Powell. From this point on I’ll be your main point of contact at MBO. Jenna has brought me up to speed on your background and I would love to connect wit you. To schedule a time on my calendar that is convienet for you, please go here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to working with you! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
